01F19CF1013A01F1646576656C6F7080616E64807075626C6963697A65F1003A01F19BF1013A01
food safety report you requested 90 days ago in a radio address. It announces, among other
things, that the agencies will: establish a new public-private partnership with industry and
consumer groups to develop and publicize simple food-safety messages (industry is raising $1
million to fund the effort); issue new regulations for fruit juice and egg products; and develop
ways to test for hepatitis A and other hard-to-detect contaminants. The report also describes in
greater detail how agencies will use their FY98 $43 million food safety increase to build the
national early warning system you announced in January, strengthen seafood inspections, and
further research.
